CPA.LS.long_name: COPAM - Companhia Portuguesa de Amidos, S.A.
CPA.LS.summary: COPAM - Companhia Portuguesa de Amidos, S.A. produces and markets starch products using corn in Portugal. The company offers products, such as starch and dextrose, as well as glucose and glucose fructose syrups; and co-products, including corn gluten feed and meal, and corn germen. It sells its products to the soft drink, antibiotic, beer, paper, confectionery, corrugated cardboard, oil, and animal feed industries.
